sub_title: Senior Business Development Manager| VAS | DCB | Carrier Billing | Psychology
summary:
I am an experienced professional with an established record of business development and product management experience. Recognized for demonstrating a natural aptitude for operating with a focus on identifying customer needs, as well as for leading all aspects of projects from inception to completion and administering a wide range of products. As such, I have consistently exceeded performance goals and I am adept at achieving maximum operational impacts. Professional focal points include operations coordination, team leadership and collaboration, stakeholder management, data analysis, client management, e-commerce, performance assessment, problem-solving, business growth, technical development, portfolio management, and campaign and project management. Delivering superior performance on the latter areas of expertise requires utilization of effective communication and interpersonal skills, as well as business acumen and analytical thinking to support efficiency and maximum success.

Currently, I am a Product Manager with Creative Clicks. Under my leadership, I operate in the Mobile Department and oversee the development, implementation, integration, and optimization of various multi-channel projects in the MENA and Nordic regions. I also communicate with external partners, prospect for and identify new opportunities that fit the product portfolio, and conduct the assessment and analysis of performance. In addition, I liaise with senior leadership and various other personnel and teams to ensure the company’s product management support structure is driving the business forward at all times.

Colleagues describe me as a driven, innovative, energetic, dynamic, and product management expert who can be relied on to offer superior operations that deliver profitable and effective results.

education.field_of_study: Public Relations, Advertising, and Applied Communication

profile_positions.title: Senior Business Development Manager

profile_positions.description:
•	Serve in the Mobile Department and administer all aspects of the development, implementation, integration, and further optimization of a range of multi-channel projects in the MENA and Nordic regions.
•	Oversee communications with a wide variety of external partners, including engaging in negotiations, reaching contractual agreements, searching for new products to be added to our portfolio, and optimizing current offers.
•	Operate as the primary point of contact for external stakeholder in regions under my representation.
•	Chart the creation and development of clear and concise requirements for new products or campaigns, as well as administering and following up on the process.
•	Conduct extensive analysis into performance, such as conversion funnel, new subscribers, churn rate, and processes to meet KPIs, invoicing, and the direct monitoring of invoices and budgets.
•	Entrusted with supporting the recruitment process, conducting interviews and hiring new members for our team; organize training and supervision of interns to support swift onboarding.
profile_positions.title: Product Manager

profile_positions.description: Within the Mobile Department @ Creative clicks I am responsible for the development, implementation, integration and further optimization for various multi-channel projects around the world. In addition to that I am directly responsible for the communication with external partners, looking for new products to be added to our rich portfolio, as well as optimization of the current offering.
profile_positions.title: Junior Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
•	Operated as a key member of the Operations Management team and partnered closely with Campaign Managers, Directors, Copywriters, and 3rd parties to optimize campaigns in the MENA and ROW regions.
•	Carried out translations from English to Bulgarian and vice versa, as well as overseeing copyediting, proofreading, and text adoption.
•	Established and cultivated close and lasting relationships and communicated with clients to administer their expectations.
•	Liaised with clients to discuss topics, develop an in-depth understanding of their technical and commercial requirements, and resolve various issues.
•	Served in an integral role by handing reconciliation, including the settlement of accounts and resolution of billing discrepancies.
•	Oversaw the technical development and monitoring of all projects to ensure maximum success.
profile_positions.title: Campaign Assistant

company.name: Archeoclub di Campobello di Licata d'Italia

profile_positions.company: Archeoclub di Campobello di Licata d'Italia
profile_positions.description:
The Archeoclub of Campobello di Licata was founded in February 18th 1998, and it counts 15 permanent members plus 3-5 seasonal volunteers.
The Archeoclub of Campobello di Licata, has been operating for years in the field of tourism, environment and culture activities, has focused its activity on knowledge, protection and enhancement of the territory's cultural heritage, playing an active role in economical and social development policies of the area.
During my internship in Archeoclub I was involved in organizing the project "Happening 2014"; I had recruited participants for the event, I had organised the daily program activities (including daily trips, interaction with participants, daily programs, surveys and etc.); I had planned events, languages courses and actively planned the logistic of the event;
Upon the end of the 2-month event, I was involved in the project writing and studying of Youth in Action and Erasmus+ projects which are financed by the European Union.
profile_positions.title: Assistant Event Manager
